Was going to an RenFest and originally ordered a Medium as the supplier had updated their comments to say they had adjusted their sizing scale but still had to return because it was way too small. I am 5’6” and 140 lbs and reordered the XXL. It’s tight but works. Definitely order a few sizes up if considering.

This was an amazing outfit for the Ren Faire. For size deets, I am 5’4, 175 lbs. I bought the 4x and it fit perfectly. The quality is great and I received so many compliments! Babe and I had a great time, and I felt so cute! You will definitely need help getting it tied in the back due to the corset type back. But it zips up the side, so you will be able to remove it solo.
The zipper broke on this corset during first use and I returned it. Otherwise it looked cute.

评论概述: Quality product but runs very small
评论详情: Unfortunately my order was delayed twice so I didn't get it in time to wear for my Renaissance Festival costume so I had to improvise. Other than that the corset is stunning!!😍 be warned it runs really small. I usually wear an XL so after reading some reviews I ordered a 3XL. I maxed out the lacing in the back and still struggled a bit but it's great once it's on, lol. I will be ordering every color but in a 4XL from now on. Beautiful craftsmanship, well put together. 👏🏿 highly recommend 👌🏾
Es de muy buena calidad,buenos detalles es muy lindo. Yo lo compre en talla 3xl y generalmente uso blusas talla M-L

Finally! I've found a brand that does quality corsets for everyday wear. It's comfortable, and I don't have to worry about clothing malfunctions in public. This top pairs well with pants or skirts, and I would only change the ties on the back. Instead of a black shoestring, a leather or silk-like ribbon would look or pair better. I replaced mine with a silk-like ribbon I had on hand, but it will need to be replaced with a longer string to try to tie it myself. I will be returning to Charmian's for my future needs.
Bought size according to measurements & still didn't fit.
Ordered large I am usually an 8 or medium. The large was too small. Zipper could only go 1/2 way so ribs up would not close.

This is a super cute corset, and perfect for my Viking costume. BUT, it’s way too small to hold my size “G”s. I’m somewhere between sizes, but typically wear a size 14 which would’ve been an XL. I ordered a XXL just in case, and still couldn’t get everything tucked in.

Bought this hoping it would be better than the cheap corsets on Amazon with plastic bones, especially as it advertised itself saying it had steel bones, was very disappointed that the only way this product is better than the cheap $15 corsets here is that the panels are cut out to be in the shape of a body instead of a tube. But no waist tape, no steel bones, cheap grommets, cheap fabric, and a flimsy zipper that I can see busting after a few wears.

I ordered a medium (I’m usually between a small and medium). It doesn’t even come close to fitting even when u completely let out the back strings.  It’s a beautiful design but u basically have to order at least one or two sizes bigger than normal

评论概述: The title of this review is What the Hell!
评论详情: Now I'm very disappointed in this store. Now I know this store run small. So I ordered a few size up. And I still can't fit it I even reinjust it. Still couldn't fit it. All I can say is wth . At this point people need start commundating. US size including plus size women too. Now the corset is beautiful very beautiful. But it DOES NOT COMMUNDATE US SIZE AND PLUS SIZE ONLY SMALL SIZE. And medium size and large that it. Do better that all I can say. Im just glad I didn't waste 70 dollars. On this.

The corset is perfect for what I got it for but I have been wearing corsets for a very long time now and the boning is plastic not steel. I feel like if I had needed steel I would have been disappointed especially for the price.

I give this corset a 3/5 but listen up, here is why…. The corset itself is very pretty and looks as pictured. I ordered an XL i usually wear an L to XL in clothing and this corset with the lace fully stretched wont get anywhere close to fit. Im also a bit heavier set in the chest and feel like this might be an issue. My plan is to order some lace to see if i can make it wider just a bit to be able to fit it as i need it in a couple weeks to be ready and thats ok. Its super cute and im really looking forward to seeing if this works out cause i would really love to support these guys.
It runs a bit small but otherwise it's really cute.

评论概述: I was sent the wrong size and even with that runs small
评论详情: I was sent a medium instead of large and even with that letting out the lace didn't allow me to fit the medium so these things run incredibly small. Even with getting the large I'm not sure if it would fit. But ironically the top part is bigger so the sizes are way off

I bought this for my warrior princess character and it turned out SO BADASS. I’m 16 and 5,8 almost 5,9 and I’m wearing an X-Large. My stomach hangs out a little bit so I was expecting it to be hard to breathe but it wasn’t! Completely comfortable and adjustable from the back and once you loosen up the lace in the back you should just be able to take it in and off with the zipper rather then messing with the lace each time wearing it (IMPORTANT NOTE: I bought the sword SEPARATELY it DOES NOT come with the sword!)
Absolutely love this. It’s a bit pricier than I had hoped but the quality is great. I followed the size guide and got a 2XL. Fits perfectly.
The bottoms part was too big, the bra part was good but the shawl part was too small and uncomfortable. The pocket purses looked very fake and plastic.

I was so excited to find this as I have a cosplay event to attend. The fit is good, though it will require a bra if only to prevent nip slips as the bust does not fully conform to my chest. The shoulder attachment is a bit flimsy and doesn’t lay down as well as I would want when I move. Overall, I’m pretty content with this purchase.
I normally wear a 1xl-2xl. I went all the way up to a 6x and it fit more like a l/xl. I would've loved it for my warrior fae costume 😫
I’m a large but I order several sizes up because I’m big in the chest so I ordered a 3xl and it didn’t go around me at all. Way too small.
Love it, only took off a star because my bust is too small for the cups, so that part doesn't quite fit right. Other than that I love it! Bought it to wear to a concert and can't wait to show it off!

If you’re wanting to wear this more than once, I would get a higher quality.  But if it’s for Halloween, for one night, this’ll do it.  Kinda pricy for one night though…Definitely plastic where the ‘leather’ is.  It’s just shoe laces to strap it up.  I do like the fabric used.  Overall a great steam punk look.Bolero really does stick out a lot!  You can pull it forward all you want and that is going to stick out.  Bummer, cuz it adds a great look.I’m 5’6” x 130lbs - wearing the large.29” waste, 36” for breast measurement (the part I was most worried about fitting me).:)

In both photos I am wearing an extra vertical strap so ignore that. The corset is laced in a way that you can loosen and tighten yourself while wearing (my favorite thing since I was not expecting it) The material is so good and while it does cinch, you can easily leave room for a food belly and normal breathing without losing the hourglass shape. I loved being able to zip myself into it and THEN adjust the laces. The zipper came apart when I first used it and simply put the plastic end back the zippper track and zipped back down, fixed it no problem. Otherwise, I would highly recommend. Definitely plan on wearing again for future cosplays.

It's very strong it won't fold or bend, has a zipper on the side but it is still adjustable by the cord on the back. I love the little jacket piece but i wish it had 1 more whole on the chest strap. I choose the size using the size guide with my inches measurements.

评论概述: It's very pretty but not steel boned
评论详情: It's a very pretty corset. I got the red lace skulls pattern. I went by the size chart and it fits fine but doesn't give a nice shape. It's ok and will work for my Renaissance fest outfit but I'm a bit disappointed. I have bigger hips and went in knowing I'd need to add hip gores to it but I can't because of where the zipper is located.  The cute bolero top part has a funky fit. The shoulders are not broad enough for the XL size and it bunches under the armpits because of that.  My biggest gripe is the boning. It's not spiral steel, it's a flimsy plastic. It will still make a cute addition to my costume but there is no way it will give any waist reduction even if there was enough room in the hips. But honestly what did I expect for the price? I'm just disappointed there is not a good way to fix it without major alterations.  Again, very pretty but the fit and construction are lacking. I'm 40-33-42

评论概述: Nice costume piece, but check your size
评论详情: I don’t know why the seller includes only waist measurements for choosing a size. Waist doesn’t correlate to a specific chest size. To help other buyers, I have a 42 inch bust (34I in us/34GG in uk sizing) and I had to send the first one back and get a 4xl (I normally wear a l/xl, not plus size) so these run EXTREMELY small. But it is a good costume piece, I’m excited for Halloween
I'm normally size xl and I had to size up to 5xl. I'm well endowed in the chest area but the whole thing runs small. The corset is a really good quality though. Looks super badass.
Good quality for the price. I bought a size larger than what I typically wear, and it fits great!
Cute but i am broad shouldered and it doesnt fit across my chest. Looks weurd when you move the laces to do so.

评论概述: Perfect corset, great quality, comfortable and tons of compliments
评论详情: Purchased this for a day at the Rennisance fair.  Received compliments all day on it and including those with corset stores on site!!  Highly recommend.  Quality was amazing, fabric comfortable (even on a 90 degree day), fit was accurate.I am approx a 38” bust and 34-35” waist.  Purchased the large and fit great!
Very nice just run supper small

Very nicely made, definitely go up a size more than you think. I thought I would need the medium but I got the XL and I’m 5’5” 160lbs and it fit great. I will say the jacket was a bit big on me but it wasn’t a huge deal to me. I probably could have gotten the large and been okay but it’s nice to have wiggle room if need be! Loved the pockets and all the details on it, perfect for the Ren Fair I got so many compliments on my costume!
Product came in with a ripped zipper. Also missing jacket, collar, and pockets. Quality is also poorly made with weak bonding.

Definitely size up! I’m a size M/L normally and I bought an XL and it’s SNUG I know the reviews were mixed about the jacket but it fits well (im not busty) it does poof out in the back but the corset just goes over it. 36B 32” waist 39” hips Love all the extra pockets and belts. Can’t wait to wear it to RenFaire!

Rennisance Faire fun costume - difficult to get into, I definitely need an extra set of hands! Make this the last thing you put on, because there's no bending over after while breathing at the same time.  A few strings are popping out, a pair of scissors fixed that.  I'm a 38DD, wear size Large tops with wide hips- got an 3XL top. A bit difficult to squeeze into, but I got it zipped and the girls look great!

评论概述: Very cool but zipper is cheap
评论详情: First of all this is very cool. Looks great. I ended up sending it back but that was my fault. The size chart said I was a medium (5’9” 150 lbs, 38”bust 30” waist.) The comments all said “it runs so small you have to size up!!” I believed the comments and sized up to a large. It was way too big. My comment is don’t size up. Just follow the size chart provided. Now, that was my fault. So why three stars? Well, even though it was too big on me the zipper broke immediately and I was stuck in this thing for a while. Then I redid the zipper and still had issues. Everything about it except the zipper is beautiful. I would consider ordering a new one in my correct size even though the zipper is low quality. I would maybe just think about how to hide my nips if the zipper randomly breaks and this thing falls off.

This was purchased as a gift for a friend of mine who has a corset obsession and had been eyeing this particular one for quite some time. The color and detail given to this piece was beautiful. After trying it on, she was even more satisfied because of its fit. There were no complaints of stiffness or discomfort. If I trusted that my girls would be supported properly, I’d purchase one for myself.
Fast shipment quality was phenomenal. I received so many compliments from so many people at the Janet Jackson concert last night.

I absolutely love it. I'm 4'8" 150lbs, ordered a size M, it almost didn't fit, but I was able to squeeze into it, but I had to skip every other eyelet hole so I would have enough length for the laces to chinch it up.
The style is very cool, fabric is thick and quite stiff so the upper separate part was very uncomfortable
Sorry guys I ordered one too small,but very good quality
Color and fabric was fine but I ordered a size larger and while it fit with the back panel, there wasn't enough to thread it. Had to go pick up ribbon

I love this top.  It is pretty tight because it’s a corset, so you might want to get one size bigger, unless like me, you want it tight to push them boobies up, and that it does! Great addition to my renaissance costume
Wear a large, ordered an extra large, fit like a small

The quality of the product was nice and I was so excited when I pulled it out of the box…but I normally wear a large, I looked at the sizing chart and decided I better go with a 2XL (which let’s be honest, it’s a hot to the ego) when I tried it on it was a good 4-5 inches away from being able to pull together…FOUR TO FIVE INCHES! I would have to order a 4-6XL at that rate. Highly disappointed
I have this corset in 4 colors. It took a little bit to get the size right on them. But once I did oh I am so happy with them. They are easy to get on and wear.

Very cute. The pouches are too small for anything but bank card and lipstick. I’m a medium in most clothes; sometimes small. I’m 5’5” tall and weigh 138. I have to have XL size to fit under arms comfortably.
A lot of stuff for the money.  Lots of attachments, belts, buckles.  This is a serious piece.  Not cheaply made at all.  Will order more for my wife.
Received wrong color in the zipper is broken on it as well

Runs a little small. If you usually wear a size large order an XL. Other than that it is a beautiful, comfortable corset. I bought it to match my dungeons and dragons character for a party and I felt like I looked amazing and I recieved a lot of compliments.  I am extremely happy how my costume came out.

评论概述: Trust me when I tell you which size you need
评论详情: I first bought this in an XL cuz I have other corsets in XL. Way off, I went back to the reviews and saw that if you're around 185lbs you gotta try the 4X. So ego aside, I did. The shoulder part is a little big but I'm wearing a shirt under it anyway for the Renaissance faire. It fits absolutely perfect. Loosen it up and have somebody help you get into it for sure. It shapes me, I feel so secure, and looks totally badass! I love it! Plus it matches my hair lol!

I love it I got so many compliments on my outfit the only issue I had was breathing in it lol..j don’t know how these women use to do it back in the days and still doing it now.. overall it was worth the purchase
While the waist fits perfectly, for some reason, they seem to think that anyone wearing this would have a G cup bust or bigger. The cost to alter it would be more than I paid.

评论概述: Can't believe something like this was even created...
评论详情: Worst design in any clothing item I've ever bought! Sze bust/waist is all wrong (I wear M, bought M, but waist is like L and the straps with money pouch are like XXL, hanging loose to your crotch... No way to tighten...). So many pieces, can't wear by yourself--need someone to help you (back is a lace-up corset like a wedding dress, how awfully inconvenient, there's nobody at home to help me get dressed, so how do you even wear this out of your house w/o anyone helping you??) Different parts don't fall nicely when they overlap. After all that trying on, in the end I found a triangular piece looking like g-string crotch piece -- where the heck does it even go??? Nowhere in the pics shows this piece! Don't bother wasting your money unless you're a glutton for punishment!

I’ve bought a corset from this brand before and it lasted through quite a few wears.  It isn’t the most expensive feeling material but it’s comfortable. I was actually thinking I’d need to return it because it didn’t look like it would fit me right. But I tried it on and it fits really quite well!  The only thing I would change about it is I wish there were clips to hold the over shirt to the corset. I feel the shoulder piece just wiggles around a bit too much. But I can make a quick fix for that.  Would buy again!
Runs very small. Good quality. Comes with 2 extras I did not know. Will buy again

评论概述: Way to small and cheap materials
评论详情: It was so small, as if for a doll or child

Overall I'm satisfied it's a very stylish cool corset, but ultimately uncomfortable to wear for long - I've only had it on a few minutes and I'm already dying to take it off - I will keep despite the discomfort; I think it would work great for a steam punk Poison Ivy Cosplay! 🤪

评论概述: Use the try before you buy feature
评论详情: I'm 5'2" 168 lbs. Lol this is a great looking outfit and if you have a fit body, it'll be great. If you are slightly overweight, save yourself the headache and dont bother. I started with the XL. It was about 9 inches shy of going around to zip.  This is where I will take a moment to say the try before you buy is a lifesaver!  I moved on the 2xl. It didnt look any larger than the XL, and was still many inches from being close enough to zip.  I ordered the 5xl before ragequitting and deciding to go in a different direction altogether.  The 5XL fit, but then I took a deep breath and it just unzipped itself. That was when I rage quit this entire experience. I regret not taking photos as it was a comical experience, I feel many might enjoy laughing at.
Super cool look, great fit, feels comfy, & is adjustable. Got tons of compliments. It was a mood for sure.

Highly upset that I received only the vest in medium and the underwear was a large. The vest was even missing pieces.  I ordered 2 different colors and the 2nd one arrived a XXL. I wear a small!!!! Will not be ordering again

I purchased a large bc of my DD boobs. The color, the detail was just beautiful. I got alot of great comments. Down side i couldnt put this on alone. Definitely a 2 man job. I do recommend either way.

评论概述: I bought this for my 16 year old
评论详情: Omg 😲 this was a Christmas present for my 16 year old. I went to wrap it and the leather thongs fell out of the package. I was mortified. I did end up giving them to her with an explanation, so after 2 hours of trading me for buying her lingerie she went and put it on minus the thongs. She said it was very difficult to put on. The shoulder shrug was extremely small and she looked like she was a contortionist trying to wear it. Not sure how many times this one will be worn but I'm guessing not much
Beautiful item seems to be a good quality for the price, but runs very small. I would say at least two sizes, small possibly three in my opinion as a larger busted woman.

I wanted to dress in steampunk this year, not really knowing what steampunk was! This was worth every dime! It is thick. The strings in the back of the corset is thick. I loved everything about it. The only con I can think of is the jacket holes for your arms are too small. By the end of the night, it was rubbing under my arms raw. I have muscular arms for a female. I don't have any fat on my arms, but I guess they are thick for my size so if you have chunky arms or muscular arms just keep that in mind. Of course it's not super comfortable, it's a corset! It is comfortable for being a corset, if that means anything.
Nice material, fast delivery
PEFECT FIT.

Per the reviews a size 6x was recommended. However, I wear an XL and only a 2X was available so I ordered the 2X and replaced the laces with longer laces so that I could widen the garment and fit it. I just wore a black tube underneath in case there were any gaps exposing skin. It was perfect and I received a lot of compliments. Oh, and the neck choker is in the wrong position in this photo lol.
This was perfect for my costume!
Great for Viking weekend at Renfest!
Beautiful corset, but unable to wear since zipper was broken. Received great customer service. Thank you

评论概述: Good quality but much much smaller than expected
评论详情: Really cute and well made but much much smaller than expected

Pros; Colors are vibrant. Material is decent. Pockets are functional. Lacing in the back allows for adjustment. Con; Cup area is flat (unlike cups of a bra or higher end bustier) so you won’t get much shape or support. Don’t know how it will look if you are busty. I’m 32c and as the night went on, I noticed that if I raised my arms, I sometimes popped out.

I learned the hard way that girdles need to be bought like 3 to 4 sizes larger than you are. I ended up on a 3 XL that barely fit me from EBay. I’m 190lbs and 5’ 8” but this piece was really cute wish it could’ve fit.
I read all of the reviews and went by the waist measurement which was best. No complaints at all!
Wish I could return this. Not worth the money at all. Got it and tried it on but didn't wear until recently. Fell apart before the day was over.

I really like this bodice!  Seems to be well made.  Love that the jacket is separate. It has a zipper and back ties so you can put it on by yourself...although I'd honestly just prefer ties. Worked well for a steampunk pirate costume.

评论概述: You get what you pay for
评论详情: Returned
NO photo's because it doesn't fit couldn't even zip up even when unlaced

I loved this,  I really did. It fit ok. I measured. It fit snug but not tight with no room to tighten it so it was ok. It looked great though the neck piece was weird and the shrug gaped bad at the back. An hour in the zipper failed at the bottom and totally busted open. This is without it even being cinched tight.  Based on performance I don't recommend.  It needs a heavy duty zipper, not the cheap thin one that's on it.  Luckily I had a tank top on underneath. This was my Halloween costume though and left me without a costume,  so disappointing!I did return it and received a refund.

I purchased to wear to a western party theme.  I am a size 1/2, bought a small and returned for a medium. It also seemed VERY small, until I realized there is a side lace you can adjust!  A little bit of a faff to get it on and fitted properly but once you figure it out it's great. Quality is surprisingly good for a costume, nicely finished so that when you adjust that lace the inside flap fits nicely under it so there are no gaps. Recommend it. I bought the brown will wear with jeans and boots.  Pretty sexy.
This was perfect for my steampunk Loki costume. I added an undershirt for the sleeves. Sizing runs very small, this is the 6x. I am a size 18 for comparison.
Cheaply made/ zipper sucks!

Bought this item to go with my halloween outfit. Measured and got the right size actually a tad big and put it on getting ready for a party and it ripped from the zipper seem all the way to the top looked at zipper and it only had one stitch all the way up. If sewn better would be a great product.

The quality on this is great. Not flimsy like "costume" material but a true corset that holds everything in beautifully. Follow others reviews and size WAY up (I'm normally an XL, and this is a 6x that fit like a glove)

Love this corset! Very good quality. Was a little worried because I’ve never bought or worn one before. I ordered a medium (I’m 5’6 & 128lbs) and it fit really well with a lot of string left to let it out to be bigger if needed. I wore a long sleeve shirt under for my Halloween costume and received lots of compliments on it.
Way too small

My first corset! It fit perfectly for me. Snug but breathable, didn't shift but didn't prevent my movement. I love that the "jacket" is removable if you want to go full strapless looking. I'm a 40D bust FYI

200lb, 40F, 39” waist… usually about a size 18-20 in tops, bc boobs.  This thing is AWESOME. Every seam finished and clean, detailing on the cups is phenomenal, and laces are like thick cotton boot laces, not cheap-looking stringy crap.  Came laced. Two sets of laces, one starts at the top, the other at the bottom. So you can adjust and tie it yourself. Once you have it set, there’s a side zipper. So u can just zip in/out. Zipper is smooth and completely finished. Hardware doesn’t look cheap and the boning is nice and wide so it doesn’t dig.  There is no stretch- i would not suggest ordering a size down. If you don’t want it hyper tight, deffo go at least one size up.  I got the XXL first— it’s a corset, and it did technically fit, BUT- the laces in the back were way far apart. I’m thinking about 6”….but i didn’t lace it as tight as it could go. I’d rather be comfortable.  So I am exchanging for a 4x, bc the 3x is sold out.
Nice looking!!! I haven't tried it on as of yet.

I'm completely inexperienced with corsets, so I can't comment there, but I love this top! The quality feels lovely and it's so flattering.  I was a feeling a bit bummed that I've gained like 5-10 lbs in the past few months and worried something like this might accentuate that. However, I feel completely confident in this top! I am 5'7" and 155lbs right now, and purchased the XL. Everything is pretty much on the tightest setting, so I probably could have gone down to the large no problem. However, I like the fit of the jacket (being slightly loose) and didn't feel like returning to size down. I'm using this more as a top rather than a corset anyway. It's comfortable and breathable while still being form-fitting and holds everything in place how I have it right now. Love the cute little pouches! I will likely purchase from this company again if this top is any indication of how awesome their other products are.
The order came quick and the corset is as described but the top piece that covers the top of the corset did not come in the package.  :(
Either their measurements were off or mine were.

I read reviews that said but two sizes bigger to fit. I'm normally a large so I bought an XXL and I could not get it to fit at all. I bought it for a Halloween party and now have no time to order a new one. Definitely get 3 or 4 sizes bigger if you want it to fit.
according to the amazon sizing it sai a 3x would fit me, it did not, so i went even bigger and go a 5x, that was also too small, i normally fot into a 1x garment, the overall quality is fine tho
